content: Plastics, a major portion of the chemicals industry, are of particular concern from a pollution standpoint. Poor waste management practices, rather than the absolute volume of plastic waste generated, is the main factor that determines how much oceanic pollution occurs.
!Source: Ritchie and Roser [owid_plastic], who draw upon Jambeck et al. [plastic_mis] and Li et al. [plastic_marine].
